review: Outstanding game, One of the best I have ever played so far. Vermintide really has some potential and I am positive that it will only get better and better from hear on out. It gives a new hope for the Warhammer Fantasy world since the devastating fall of Warhammer Online: Age of Reckoning, which I loved to bits.Warhammer: The End Times - Vermintide will not disappoint YOU!
Beautiful just beautiful 10/10. If only everyone thought like Dropsy. <3
The idea of the game has potential, The camera is terrible and goes all over the place. Very glitchy and needs some TLC all in all the COULD be a good game but isn't.
